name: UPS Sales & Installation
description: We offer a wide range of UPS systems from top brands including APC, Homage, Solarmax, and Inverex with professional installation services.

name: Solar Inverter Solutions
description: Complete solar inverter solutions for residential and commercial applications, helping you harness renewable energy efficiently.

name: Battery Replacement
description: Professional replacement services for all types of UPS and solar system batteries, including both lead-acid and lithium options.

name: Maintenance & Repair
description: Regular maintenance and repair services to ensure your power backup systems operate at peak efficiency and reliability.

name: Consultation Services
description: Expert advice on choosing the right power backup solution for your specific needs, whether residential or commercial.

name: Warranty Support
description: Comprehensive warranty support for all products sold by Hashim Traders, ensuring peace of mind with your purchase.
